price: 37. Ata ozali kosala ndenge nyoso mpo bakambama, ya soló, Allah akambaka baye babunga te mpe bakozua moto ya kosalisa mpe kolongisa bango te.
arabic: إِن تَحۡرِصۡ عَلَىٰ هُدَىٰهُمۡ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهۡدِي مَن يُضِلُّۖ وَمَا لَهُم مِّن نَّٰصِرِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: in taḥriṣ ʿalā hudāhum fa-inna al-laha lā yahdī man yuḍillu wamā lahum min nāṣirīna
